name: Treenewal GGJ Nov2020
description:
Help the Tree Grow!

ASWD to move the character

Give it up for Team2 - overcoming all the odds and a fallen comrade...

1 Audio Demon - Katastr0ph3 (https://soundcloud.com/katastr0ph3) All the beautiful sounds and music!

1 Awesome Artist - EmbleEm (https://imginn.com/emma_blencowe/) Killer Start and Win Screens!

1 Frantic Generalist - Pix Atack  ( https://www.tumblr.com/blog/creativeari ) A Playable Thing (made in  < 24hrs) and The little characters at the end!

Get well soon Robert Blaauboer! And thanks Vincent Salgueiro, not sure where you went but you were helpful!

*also one placeholder sound effect on the puddle spawn from www.zapsplat.com - for now!

Still many bits to give TLC to but have run out of time! Had a blast, thanks GGF organizers, you rock!
